newsTiles.title: Disaster Tough Podcast + RSET
newsTiles.body: Check out the Disaster Tough Podcast S6E235! We had a great time discussing RSET's impact on Emergency Management with host John Scardena.

newsTiles.title: RSET at the US Embassy - London
newsTiles.body: Beyond showcasing RSETâ€™s cutting-edge capabilities, the event provided an opportunity to promote Kentucky on the global stage. Click to read more about this incredible opportunity.

newsTiles.title: Training for Real-World Challenges
newsTiles.body: In February, RSET had the privilege of participating in the Emergency Management Response for Dynamic Populations training at the Ambipar Response Training Center in Pueblo, Colorado.

newsTiles.title: Join us on Discord!
newsTiles.body: The RSET Discord server is the best place to connect with other users, ask questions, get technical help and more! Click to join us!
